channel.title: Vim on ZWEERTS.xyz
channel.description: Recent content in Vim on ZWEERTS.xyz

item.title: Basic Vimrc
item.description: syntax on filetype plugin indent on set relativenumber set wildmenu set wildignore=*.exe,*.dll,*.pdb,*/node_modules/* set hidden set spell set is set ignorecase set smartcase set cursorline set ruler set tabstop=4 set shiftwidth=4 set expandtab
